titleStmt.title: The young-womans complaint: or, A caveat to all maids to have a care how they be married to old men The tune is, What should a young woman do with an old man, &c. or, The tyrant.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Gilbertson in Giltspur-street without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives range of dates: 1655-1665.
In four columns with two woodcuts above the first two columns.
Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.
